trans-unit.source: Provides a set of services for registering and unregistering managed assemblies for use from COM.
trans-unit.target: 提供一組服務用來從 COM 註冊和取消註冊 Managed 組件。

trans-unit.source: Registration is needed when the objects within an assembly are being used by COM clients.
trans-unit.target: 組件內的物件會使用由 COM 用戶端時，就需要登錄。

trans-unit.source: Returns the GUID of the COM category that contains the managed classes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含 Managed 類別之 COM 分類的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The GUID of the COM category that contains the managed classes.
trans-unit.target: 包含 Managed 類別之 COM 分類的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: The type whose ProgID is being requested.
trans-unit.target: ProgID 受要求的型別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the COM ProgID for a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 擷取指定型別的 COM ProgID。

trans-unit.source: The ProgID for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定型別的 ProgID。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to search for classes.
trans-unit.target: 要搜尋類別的組件。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a list of classes in an assembly that would be registered by a call to <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags)" />.
trans-unit.target: 擷取組件中的類別清單，此組件是藉由呼叫 <see cref="M:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags)" /> 而註冊。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Type" /> array containing a list of classes in <paramref name="assembly" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> 陣列，含有 <paramref name="assembly" /> 中類別的清單。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 要登錄的組件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags" /> value indicating any special settings needed when registering <c>assembly</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.AssemblyRegistrationFlags" /> 值，表示在註冊 <c>assembly</c> 時所需要的任何特殊設定。

trans-unit.source: Registers the classes in a managed assembly to enable creation from COM.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 Managed 組件中的類別，以啟用從 COM 的建立。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="assembly" /> contains types that were successfully registered; otherwise <see langword="false" /> if the assembly contains no eligible types.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="assembly" /> 含有成功登錄的型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" /> (如果組件沒有包含合適的型別)。

trans-unit.source: `RegisterAssembly` adds the appropriate registry entries for the types in the specified assembly.
trans-unit.target: `RegisterAssembly` 將適當的登錄項目類型中指定的組件。

trans-unit.source: This method also calls any registration functions found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會呼叫組件中找到的任何註冊函式。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to get an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Reflection.Assembly.Load%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>以取得組件。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The full name of <paramref name="assembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 的完整名稱是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> is not <see langword="static" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記的方法不是 <see langword="static" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is more than one method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> at a given level of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層架構的指定層級中，有一個以上的方法是以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The signature of the method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComRegisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記之方法的簽章無效。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The type to be registered for use from COM.
trans-unit.target: 要註冊來從 COM 使用的型別。

trans-unit.source: GUID used to register the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 用來註冊指定型別的 GUID。

trans-unit.source: Registers the specified type with COM using the specified GUID.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 GUID 來註冊 COM 的特定型別。

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling `CoRegisterClassObject` in COM.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法相當於呼叫`CoRegisterClassObject`在 COM 中

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The type to determine if it is a COM type.
trans-unit.target: 型別，決定是否為 COM 型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified type is a COM type.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的型別是否為 COM 型別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified type is a COM type; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的型別為 COM 型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The type to check for COM registration requirements.
trans-unit.target: 要檢查是否符合 COM 註冊需求的型別。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified type requires registration.
trans-unit.target: 判斷指定的型別是否需要登錄。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type must be registered for use from COM; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果型別必須註冊才能從 COM 使用，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。

trans-unit.source: The assembly to be unregistered.
trans-unit.target: 要取消註冊的組件。

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the classes in a managed assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取消註冊 Managed 組件中的類別。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="assembly" /> contains types that were successfully unregistered; otherwise <see langword="false" /> if the assembly contains no eligible types.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="assembly" /> 含有成功取消註冊的型別，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" /> (如果組件沒有包含合適的型別)。

trans-unit.source: `UnregisterAssembly` removes the registry entries for the types in the specified assembly previously added by <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `UnregisterAssembly` 移除先前加入所指定的組件中類型的登錄項目<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.IRegistrationServices.RegisterAssembly%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method also calls any unregistration functions found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會呼叫組件中找到的任何取消登錄函式。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="assembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The full name of <paramref name="assembly" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="assembly" /> 的完整名稱是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
A method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> is not <see langword="static" />.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記的方法不是 <see langword="static" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
There is more than one method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> at a given level of the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 在階層架構的指定層級中，有一個以上的方法是以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The signature of the method marked with <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 以 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComUnregisterFunctionAttribute" /> 標記之方法的簽章無效。

trans-unit.source: requires full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 需要完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任或安全性透明程式碼。
